title: Veggie Lasagna
steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, then saut√© the broccoli, onion, and red peppers for 5 minutes.
Add the tomatoe sauce and cook another 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, cheddar cheese, and eggs.
In two 9 x 13 inch greased casserole dishes, repeat 3 layers of: (1/6) of the sauce-veggies mixture, 2-3 noodles, (1/6) of the cheese mixture.
Optional: top with a thin layer of tomatoe sauce and cheddar cheese.
